title: FPS drops and Riot can't even solve it
body:
i dont know how many time i submit my ticket for helping fps dropping. they just give me same answer turn of the DVR, i did for 100 years ago, my game worked perfectly before they update new client, and now i can't even play custom game because the fps drops from >200 to <10. I test on Dota and steam game, nothing happen. 
They keep telling me turn of the dvr. that's only way you help to solve it? I QUIT

replies.body: In-game occurrences are independent and separate from the updated client itself, but it is possible that some game files may have become corrupt during a patch update.  As Rineyy suggested, we do have an [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to help tune up your drivers, files, and anything else that can cause fps to drop.  Go over each step for a fix!

Boost your FPS by utilising the **[Frames for days booster.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting)** This booster is legal and is approved by Riot.
